scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && cmake -B build && cmake --build build && ./build/poker_server"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && cmake -B build && cmake --build build
scripts.test:server: cd server && cmake -B build -DBUILD_TESTS=ON && cmake --build build && cd build && ctest --output-on-failure
scripts.test:all: npm run test:server && npm run test:component && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:server && npm run test:component -- --ci --maxWorkers=2 && npm run test:e2e -- --reporter=html
scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && cmake -B build
